Html: It seems that Microsoft has kindly introduced a new version of .ost files for Outlook 2013 (see http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc179067.aspx). When I try reading this with the pstsdk, I get an exception on get_name_id_map(). Hey Terryma, any chance you can do a new release with support for this? Sorry, the work is totally beyond my compentence level :(
